A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What I love about storytelling is it’s ability to be unpredictable. What I love about sequels is that it grabs characters you love and root for\, and takes them into exciting new directions. This iteration of Star Wars does all of that really well. Star Wars today isn’t meant to please those who grew up with the original trilogy. It’s meant to take the franchise in an exciting new direction for the latest generation of kids to love. It ends up setting up a great end to the trilogy. However\, there are a few jokes here and there that shouldn’t be in this film.
